tatami.core.util.platformUtils

Class PlatformUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.util.platformUtils.PlatformUtils

  • public class PlatformUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Platform-related functionality. All functions should be static.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

      • getPlatform

        public static PlatformUtils.Platform getPlatform()

      • platformSupportsWebServices

        public static boolean platformSupportsWebServices()
        FIXME: should be split into WS registration and WS invocation.
        Returns:
        true if the current platform supports web service registration and invocation.

      • platformLogType

        public static net.xqhs.util.logging.logging.LogWrapper.LoggerType platformLogType()
        Returns:
        the type of log (on of LogWrapper.LoggerType) appropriate for the current platform.

      • jadeInterfaceClass

        public static java.lang.String jadeInterfaceClass()
        Returns:
        the name of the class implementing JadeInterface that is appropriate to use for the current platform.

      • classExists

        public static boolean classExists(java.lang.String className)
        Checks if the specified class exists.
        Parameters:
        className - - the fully qualified name of the class.
        Returns:
        true if the class exists, false otherwise.

      • loadClassInstance

        public static java.lang.Object loadClassInstance(java.lang.Object loadingClass,
                                 java.lang.String className,
                                 java.lang.Object... constructorArguments)
                                          throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                 java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                 java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                 java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Creates a new instance of a class that is not known at compile-time.
        Parameters:
        loadingClass - - an instance created with the class loader to use to create the new instance. Can be new Object().
        className - - the name of the class to instantiate.
        constructorArguments - - an object array specifying the arguments to pass to the constructor of the new instance. The types of the objects in this array will be used to identify the constructor of the new instance.
        Returns:
        the newly created instance. If the creation fails, an exception will be surely thrown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - -
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - -
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - -
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - -
        java.lang.InstantiationException - -
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - -
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - -

      • getSimulationGuiClass

        public static java.lang.String getSimulationGuiClass()
        Returns:
        the class for the Simulation Manager GUI.

      • toVector

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> toVector(java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Converts the arguments into a Vector containing all arguments passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments to assemble into the vector.
        Returns:
        the vector containing all arguments.

      • printException

        public static java.lang.String printException(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method to print an exception as a string.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a String containing all details of the exception.

      • getParameterValue

        public static java.lang.String getParameterValue(net.xqhs.util.XML.XMLTree.XMLNode XMLnode,
                                 java.lang.String parameterName)
        Method to simplify the access to a parameter of an agent. Having the XMLTree.XMLNode instance associated with the agent, the method retrieves the value associated with the first occurrence of the desired parameter name.
        Parameters:
        XMLnode - - the node containing the configuration information for the agent.
        parameterName - - the name of the searched parameter.
        Returns:
        the value associated with the searched name.

      • systemExit

        public static void systemExit(int exitCode)
        Performs system exit, depending on platform.
        Parameters:
        exitCode - - the exit code.
